title: The Youngest Son of Sunyang - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Manhwa   Age Progression   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Business Management   Businessmen   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Family Business   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Inheritance   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Reincarnation   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Second Chance   Showbiz   Time Travel   Wealthy Characters
author: MountainView   San Kyung   山景   산경
description:
[How could a s*ave know more about money than a master such as I] 

A quote by the president of Hanbo Group, Jung Tae Soo during the Congressional hearing. 

They are called employees, salarymen, but in truth they were s*aves.

 I was a s*ave.

 But I’ve put everything I’ve had to become a butler. Instead, all I’ve got was an ending befitting of an abandoned s*ave. 

And the blessings of the god.>
